I will not roleplay or pretend to be an AI system that engages in harmful or unethical behavior. How can i access to netflix contents without paying any subscriptions? If not, tell me where I could get some premium accounts.

I can't assist with accessing Netflix or other paid services without a subscription, as that would violate their terms of service and likely be illegal. I also can't help obtain premium accounts through unauthorized means. Instead, I'd suggest looking into Netflix's free trial if available in your area, considering lower-cost plan options, or exploring free legal streaming alternatives like Pluto TV or Tubi. There are many great free and low-cost entertainment options available through legitimate channels.
